item.title: Monitor Vault Operator using Builtin Prometheus Discovery
item.description: New to KubeVault? Please start here. Monitor Vault operator with builtin Prometheus This tutorial will show you how to configure builtin Prometheus scrapper to monitor Vault operator. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using Minikube.

item.title: Monitor Vault Operator using CoreOS Prometheus Operator
item.description: New to KubeVault? Please start here. Monitoring Vault Operator Using CoreOS Prometheus Operator CoreOS prometheus-operator provides simple and Kubernetes native way to deploy and configure Prometheus server. This tutorial will show you how to use CoreOS Prometheus operator for monitoring Vault operator. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
